ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50; Species: Ictalurus punctatus (Channel Catfish) length 46 (39-52) mm, weight 0.93 (0.76-1.22) g; Conditions: freshwater, static, 17.0 °C (16.3-17.4 °C), pH 8.0 (7.3-8.7), hardness 146 mg/L CaCO3 (136-156 mg/L CaCO3), alkalinity 109 mg/L CaCO3 (98-120 mg/L CaCO3), dissolved oxygen 8.3 mg/L (6.0-11.2 mg/L); Concentration: 370 ug/L for 48 hr (95% confidence interval: 340-390 ug/L) /formulation/
